evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs are a coalition of labor organizations, non‑profit groups, and local governments that file this complaint to hold unlawful and stop the unconstitutional dismantling of the federal government by President Trump.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs claim that President Trump, via Executive Order 14210, ordered federal agencies to implement large‑scale reductions in force and reorganization without congressional authorization, violating the Constitution and the APA.

evidence.text: Plaintiffs seek to declare these acts ... unlawful, and otherwise in excess of any constitutional or statutory authority; to hold unlawful and set aside the acts ... and to enjoin this unconstitutional reorganization of the federal government without legislative authority.
